song.englishname: The Rider On The White Horse

english.segment1: Someday I'm gonna see, see the King. Someday I'm gonna see, see the King. Someday I'm gonna see Him. Someday I'm gonna see Him. Someday I'm gonna see, see the King
english.segment2: Someday I'm gonna see, see the King. Someday I'm gonna see, see the King. Someday I'm gonna see Him. Someday I'm gonna see Him. Someday I'm gonna see, see the King
english.segment3: Someday I'm gonna see, see the King. Someday I'm gonna see, see the King. Someday I'm gonna see Him. Someday I'm gonna see Him. Someday I'm gonna see, see the King
english.segment4: Someday I'm gonna see the King. Someday I'm gonna see the King. Someday I'm gonna see Him. Someday I'm gonna see Him. Someday I'm gonna see, see the King
english.segment5: Someday I'm gonna see the King. Someday I'm gonna see the King
english.segment6: Someday..gonna see the King. Someday..gonna see, see, see, see, see, see the King
